shadcn.import: import { AspectRatio } from '@/components/ui/aspect-ratio'

notes: shadcn AspectRatio wraps Radix UI AspectRatio; vlting uses a pure CSS padding-bottom technique
Default ratio is 1 in vlting (square)
vlting accepts a style prop instead of className for custom styling

breaking.vlting: Use style prop or wrap in a styled container

shadcn.import: import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge'

notes: vlting Badge extends shadcn variants with 'solid' (alias for default) and 'subtle'
vlting adds 'tone' prop for semantic color (neutral, primary, success, warning, danger)
vlting adds 'size' prop (sm, md, lg); shadcn relies on className for sizing
vlting Badge is a Tamagui styled(Text) component; accepts Tamagui style props

breaking.vlting: Use Tamagui style props (e.g. backgroundColor, padding)

notes: No direct shadcn equivalent; Box is a generic layout primitive based on Tamagui View
Accepts all Tamagui View style props (padding, margin, backgroundColor, etc.)
The 'centered' variant sets alignItems and justifyContent to 'center'
No direct shadcn equivalent; similar to shadcn Separator but named 'Divider'
Sets role='separator' and aria-orientation automatically
Default orientation is 'horizontal'
See also the Separator primitive which is a styled Tamagui component with a similar API
No direct shadcn equivalent; shadcn uses plain HTML headings or Typography patterns
Renders semantic HTML heading elements (h1-h6) using styledHtml
Default level is 2 (renders <h2>)
Each level has preset fontSize, lineHeight, and fontWeight from Tamagui tokens
Accepts a ref (forwardRef to HTMLHeadingElement)
No direct shadcn equivalent; shadcn uses lucide-react icons directly
Wraps any icon component that accepts size + color props (e.g. @tamagui/lucide-icons)
Icons are decorative (aria-hidden=true) by default; set aria-hidden=false and aria-label for semantic icons
IconFC type: ComponentType<{ size?: number | string; color?: string }>
No direct shadcn equivalent; shadcn has no keyboard shortcut display component
Renders a semantic <kbd> HTML element using styledHtml
Default size is 'md'
Uses monospace font family ($mono) and styled border for keyboard key appearance

shadcn.import: import { Label } from '@/components/ui/label'

notes: shadcn Label wraps Radix UI Label; vlting wraps @tamagui/label
vlting adds 'size' prop (sm, md, lg) mapped to Tamagui size tokens ($2, $3, $4)
vlting adds 'required' prop that renders a red asterisk (*) after the label text
Default size is 'md'
No direct shadcn equivalent; shadcn components use Radix portals internally
Wraps Tamagui's Portal component for rendering children outside the parent DOM tree
Useful for modals, tooltips, and overlays

shadcn.import: import { Separator } from '@/components/ui/separator'

notes: shadcn Separator wraps Radix UI Separator; vlting uses Tamagui styled(View) with role='separator'
Both support orientation (horizontal/vertical) and decorative props
Default orientation is 'horizontal' in both
vlting Separator sets aria-orientation automatically via variants
vlting also exports a Divider primitive with similar functionality

breaking.vlting: Use Tamagui style props (e.g. backgroundColor, margin)

shadcn.import: import { Skeleton } from '@/components/ui/skeleton'

notes: shadcn Skeleton is a simple div with className for sizing; vlting is a Tamagui styled(View)
vlting has built-in 'lazy' animation with opacity pulse
vlting adds 'circle' variant for circular skeletons (sets borderRadius to $full)
vlting sets aria-hidden=true automatically
Size is controlled via Tamagui style props (width, height) instead of className

breaking.reason: Built-in variant instead of utility class

notes: No direct shadcn equivalent; shadcn uses margin/padding utilities or gap for spacing
Without a size prop, Spacer uses flex: 1 to fill available space
With a size prop (xs-xl), sets fixed width and height via Tamagui tokens
Useful for adding consistent spacing between elements in flex layouts
No direct shadcn equivalent; shadcn has no built-in spinner/loading component
Renders 8 dots in a circular pattern with rotating animation
Respects prefers-reduced-motion via useReducedMotion hook
Sets role='status' and aria-label='Loading' automatically
Default size is 'md'; default color uses $color token
No direct shadcn equivalent; shadcn uses div with flex utilities
Stack and VStack are vertical (YStack); HStack is horizontal (XStack)
Stack is an alias for VStack (vertical by default)
Accepts all Tamagui layout style props (gap, padding, margin, flex, etc.)
Exports: Stack (VStack alias), VStack, HStack with corresponding Props types
No direct shadcn equivalent; shadcn uses plain HTML elements with Tailwind typography
Built on Tamagui styled(Text) with $body font family
Default size is 'md'
Tone variants map to semantic color tokens ($color, $colorSubtitle, $color10, $green10, $orange10, $red10)
Accepts all Tamagui Text style props (color, fontSize, fontWeight, etc.)
No direct shadcn equivalent; shadcn uses Radix VisuallyHidden or sr-only utility class
Uses standard screen-reader-only technique (clip, clipPath, overflow hidden, 1px size)
Built on Tamagui styled(View) with inline sr-only CSS properties
Useful for accessible labels and descriptions hidden from visual display

shadcn.import: import { Accordion, AccordionContent, AccordionItem, AccordionTrigger } from '@/components/ui/accordion'

notes: shadcn uses flat exports (AccordionItem, AccordionTrigger); vlting uses compound pattern (Accordion.Item, Accordion.Trigger)
vlting defaultValue is always string[] (array), even for type='single'
Default type is 'single', default collapsible is true
Built on @tamagui/accordion; includes animated chevron indicator
Respects prefers-reduced-motion for trigger animation

breaking.reason: Consistent array API for both single and multiple types

shadcn.import: import { Alert, AlertDescription, AlertTitle } from '@/components/ui/alert'

notes: shadcn uses flat exports; vlting uses compound pattern (Alert.Root, Alert.Title, etc.)
vlting adds Alert.Icon sub-component for icon placement
Destructive variant automatically sets role='alert'; default uses role='status'
Default variant is 'default'

shadcn.import: import { AlertDialog, AlertDialogAction, AlertDialogCancel, AlertDialogContent, AlertDialogDescription, AlertDialogFooter, AlertDialogHeader, AlertDialogTitle, AlertDialogTrigger } from '@/components/ui/alert-dialog'

notes: shadcn uses flat exports; vlting uses compound pattern (AlertDialog.Root, AlertDialog.Content, etc.)
vlting has Overlay as a separate sub-component; shadcn bakes overlay into AlertDialogContent
vlting replaces AlertDialogHeader with AlertDialog.Title and AlertDialog.Description directly
Built on @tamagui/alert-dialog with animated enter/exit styles
Trigger and Cancel/Action use asChild internally

breaking.vlting: No Header wrapper; use AlertDialog.Title and AlertDialog.Description directly
asChild is used internally; pass children directly

shadcn.import: import { Avatar, AvatarFallback, AvatarImage } from '@/components/ui/avatar'

notes: vlting supports both legacy single-prop API (src, alt, fallback) and compound pattern (Avatar.Image, Avatar.Fallback)
Legacy props (src, alt, fallback) are deprecated; prefer compound pattern
vlting adds built-in 'size' prop (sm=32px, md=40px, lg=52px, xl=74px); shadcn uses className for sizing
Default size is 'md'
Image error handling shows fallback automatically via React context

shadcn.import: import { Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem, BreadcrumbLink, BreadcrumbList, BreadcrumbPage, BreadcrumbSeparator } from '@/components/ui/breadcrumb'

notes: shadcn uses flat exports (BreadcrumbItem, BreadcrumbLink); vlting uses compound pattern
vlting Breadcrumb.Root renders semantic <nav aria-label='Breadcrumb'> with <ol>
Breadcrumb.Link supports both href (anchor) and onPress (callback) navigation
Breadcrumb.Page sets aria-current='page' automatically
Separator defaults to '/' character; pass children to customize
shadcn has BreadcrumbList wrapper; vlting bakes list into Root

breaking.vlting: Not needed; list is built into Breadcrumb.Root

shadcn.import: import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'

notes: vlting adds 'solid' variant as alias for 'default'
vlting adds 'tone' prop for semantic color theming (neutral, primary, success, warning, danger)
vlting adds 'loading' prop with built-in spinner and aria-busy support
vlting size uses named tokens (xs, sm, md, lg, icon); shadcn uses default/sm/lg/icon
vlting has Button.Text and Button.Icon sub-components for compound usage
Built on @tamagui/button with focus-visible outline styles
Destructive variant automatically applies red theme

breaking.vlting: Use loading prop for built-in spinner

notes: No direct shadcn equivalent; shadcn has no ButtonGroup component
Groups buttons with connected borders (removes inner border-radius, overlaps borders)
Default orientation is 'horizontal'
Sets role='group' with optional aria-label
Uses CSS class injection for border-radius and margin adjustments on children

shadcn.import: import { Calendar } from '@/components/ui/calendar'

notes: shadcn Calendar wraps react-day-picker; vlting is a custom implementation with Tamagui styling
vlting uses minDate/maxDate for date range constraints; shadcn uses disabled matchers
vlting supports controlled month navigation via month and onMonthChange props
Default mode is 'single'
Built with semantic HTML buttons and ARIA labels for accessibility
Keyboard navigation via arrow keys for month switching

breaking.vlting: Custom API; not all react-day-picker props are available

shadcn.import: import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardFooter, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card'

notes: shadcn uses flat exports (CardHeader, CardTitle); vlting uses compound pattern (Card.Header, Card.Title)
vlting adds 'size' variant (sm, md, lg) affecting padding and text sizes
vlting adds 'elevated' variant (removes border, expects shadow via theme)
vlting adds 'interactive' variant with hover, press, focus styles and cursor pointer
Card.Title renders a semantic <h3> element; default size is 'md'
Built on @tamagui/card CardFrame with withStaticProperties

breaking.vlting: Use Tamagui style props or variant props (size, elevated, interactive)
Use interactive prop for clickable cards

shadcn.import: import { Carousel, CarouselContent, CarouselItem, CarouselNext, CarouselPrevious } from '@/components/ui/carousel'

notes: shadcn Carousel wraps Embla Carousel; vlting is a custom implementation
vlting adds built-in autoplay with autoplayInterval prop (default 5000ms)
vlting adds Carousel.Dots sub-component for dot indicator navigation
vlting respects prefers-reduced-motion (disables autoplay and transitions)
Keyboard navigation: ArrowLeft/Right for horizontal, ArrowUp/Down for vertical
Default orientation is 'horizontal'; loop defaults to false
Sets role='region', aria-roledescription='carousel' on root; aria-roledescription='slide' on items

breaking.vlting: Custom API; not all Embla options available

shadcn.import: import { Checkbox } from '@/components/ui/checkbox'

notes: shadcn Checkbox wraps Radix Checkbox; vlting wraps @tamagui/checkbox
vlting Checkbox.Root wraps everything in a <label> with flex layout (checkbox + label text)
vlting adds 'size' prop (sm, md, lg) mapped to Tamagui size tokens ($3, $4, $5)
Default size is 'md'; default check icon is a checkmark character
Pass label text as children of Checkbox.Root
Both support indeterminate state

breaking.vlting: Use Tamagui style props or size prop

shadcn.import: import { Collapsible, CollapsibleContent, CollapsibleTrigger } from '@/components/ui/collapsible'

notes: shadcn uses flat exports; vlting uses compound pattern (Collapsible.Root, Collapsible.Trigger)
Built on @tamagui/collapsible
Collapsible.Content sets role='region' automatically
Trigger is unstyled by default (transparent background, no border)

breaking.vlting: Not supported; Trigger renders children directly

shadcn.import:
import { Command, CommandEmpty, CommandGroup, CommandInput, CommandItem, CommandList } from '@/components/ui/command'
import { Popover, PopoverContent, PopoverTrigger } from '@/components/ui/popover'

notes: shadcn Combobox is composed from Command + Popover; vlting is a single integrated component
vlting takes options as a data array (ComboboxOption[]: { value, label }); shadcn uses declarative children
Built-in search filtering, keyboard navigation (ArrowUp/Down, Enter, Escape)
Sets role='combobox', aria-expanded, and aria-haspopup='listbox' for accessibility
Dropdown options use role='option' and aria-selected

breaking.reason: Integrated API; no manual composition needed

shadcn.import: import { Command, CommandDialog, CommandEmpty, CommandGroup, CommandInput, CommandItem, CommandList, CommandSeparator } from '@/components/ui/command'

notes: shadcn wraps cmdk library; vlting is a custom implementation with Tamagui styling
vlting filter returns boolean (match/no match); shadcn cmdk filter returns number (score)
vlting adds Command.Loading sub-component; shadcn uses CommandLoading from cmdk
Items support keywords prop for additional search terms beyond value
Uses React context for search state sharing between Input and Items
Sets role='listbox' on root and role='option' on items

breaking.vlting: Not available; compose Command.Root inside Dialog manually

shadcn.import: import { ContextMenu, ContextMenuCheckboxItem, ContextMenuContent, ContextMenuItem, ContextMenuLabel, ContextMenuSeparator, ContextMenuTrigger } from '@/components/ui/context-menu'

notes: shadcn wraps Radix ContextMenu; vlting is a custom implementation using native contextmenu event
vlting adds built-in 'shortcut' prop on Item for keyboard shortcut display
Menu auto-closes when an item is selected
Uses role='menu', role='menuitem', and role='menuitemcheckbox' for accessibility
Positioned at mouse cursor coordinates on right-click

shadcn.import:
import { columns } from './columns'
import { DataTable } from './data-table'

notes: Both use @tanstack/react-table under the hood
shadcn DataTable is a pattern/recipe; vlting provides a ready-to-use component
vlting supports both controlled and uncontrolled sorting, filtering, pagination, and visibility
vlting re-exports ColumnDef, SortingState, ColumnFiltersState, VisibilityState, PaginationState types
Renders using vlting Table compound component internally
Sortable columns show arrow indicators and set aria-sort attribute
Default pageSize is 10; pagination is opt-in via enablePagination

breaking.vlting: Use Tamagui style props on wrapper

breaking.reason: Simplified API; no manual table hook setup

shadcn.import:
import { Calendar } from '@/components/ui/calendar'
import { Popover, PopoverContent, PopoverTrigger } from '@/components/ui/popover'

notes: shadcn DatePicker is composed from Calendar + Popover + Button; vlting is a single integrated component
vlting includes built-in label, helperText, error state, and errorMessage support
vlting supports controlled and uncontrolled modes (value/defaultValue)
Also exports DateRangePicker for date range selection
Built-in locale support via Intl.DateTimeFormat
Default size is 'md'; supports sm, md, lg trigger sizes
Closes on Escape key or click outside

breaking.vlting: Use Tamagui style props or size prop

breaking.reason: Integrated API; no manual composition needed

shadcn.import: import { Dialog, DialogContent, DialogDescription, DialogFooter, DialogHeader, DialogTitle, DialogTrigger, DialogClose } from '@/components/ui/dialog'

notes: shadcn uses flat exports; vlting uses compound pattern (Dialog.Root, Dialog.Content, etc.)
vlting Dialog.Content accepts size prop (sm, md, lg) controlling maxWidth and padding
Overlay is rendered automatically inside Content's portal; Dialog.Overlay is a no-op kept for API compatibility
Built on @tamagui/dialog with animated enter/exit styles
Trigger and Close use asChild internally
Default size is 'md'

breaking.vlting: Use Tamagui style props or size prop

notes: No direct shadcn equivalent; shadcn has no RTL/LTR direction context
DirectionProvider wraps children with a React context for text direction
Defaults to document.documentElement.dir on web, or 'ltr' as fallback
useDirection() hook returns the current direction ('ltr' or 'rtl')
Useful for bidirectional layout support in cross-platform apps

shadcn.import: import { Drawer, DrawerClose, DrawerContent, DrawerDescription, DrawerFooter, DrawerHeader, DrawerTitle, DrawerTrigger } from '@/components/ui/drawer'

notes: shadcn Drawer wraps Vaul (vaul-drawer); vlting builds on @tamagui/dialog with fixed positioning
vlting adds 'direction' prop (bottom, top, left, right); shadcn Vaul is bottom-only by default
vlting auto-shows handle bar on touch devices for vertical drawers; override with showHandle prop
Default direction is 'bottom'
Side drawers (left, right) have a fixed width of 360px with 90vw max
Built on @tamagui/dialog with Portal, Overlay, and animated enter/exit

shadcn.import: import { DropdownMenu, DropdownMenuCheckboxItem, DropdownMenuContent, DropdownMenuItem, DropdownMenuLabel, DropdownMenuSeparator, DropdownMenuTrigger } from '@/components/ui/dropdown-menu'

notes: shadcn wraps Radix DropdownMenu; vlting is a custom implementation with keyboard navigation
vlting adds built-in 'shortcut' prop on Item for keyboard shortcut display in mono font
Full keyboard support: ArrowUp/Down navigation, Home/End, Enter/Space selection, Escape/Tab close
Focus returns to trigger on close
Sets aria-haspopup='menu', aria-expanded on trigger; role='menu' on content; role='menuitem'/role='menuitemcheckbox' on items
No direct shadcn equivalent; shadcn has no empty state component
Compound component for empty state displays (no data, no results, etc.)
Root sets role='status' for accessibility
Media sub-component renders media/icons at 50% opacity
Title renders a semantic <h3> element
Action sub-component wraps CTA buttons with top margin
No direct shadcn equivalent; shadcn uses FormField from react-hook-form integration
Compound component for accessible form fields with auto-generated IDs
Field.Control clones children with id, aria-describedby, aria-invalid, and disabled props
Field.Error renders with role='alert' and only shows when error is true
Field.Description is hidden when error is shown (error takes precedence for aria-describedby)
Uses React context to share field state (id, error, disabled) across sub-components

shadcn.import: import { Form, FormControl, FormDescription, FormField, FormItem, FormLabel, FormMessage } from '@/components/ui/form'

notes: shadcn Form deeply integrates with react-hook-form; vlting Form is a standalone component
vlting Form.Root wraps @tamagui/form with onSubmit callback
Form.Field provides error/disabled context to child components
Form.ErrorMessage renders with role='alert' and only shows when field has error
No dependency on react-hook-form; can be used with any form library or state management
Form layout uses $4 gap between fields

breaking.vlting: No form library dependency; pass onSubmit directly

breaking.reason: Simplified API; no render prop pattern

shadcn.import: import { HoverCard, HoverCardContent, HoverCardTrigger } from '@/components/ui/hover-card'

notes: shadcn wraps Radix HoverCard; vlting is a custom implementation with mouse enter/leave events
Both support openDelay and closeDelay (defaults: 700ms open, 300ms close)
vlting Content supports side (top/bottom) and align (start/center/end) positioning
Content sets role='tooltip' for accessibility
Hovering over the content keeps it open (delay cleared on re-enter)

shadcn.import: import { Input } from '@/components/ui/input'

notes: shadcn Input is a minimal styled input; vlting Input includes label, helper text, and error states
vlting uses onChangeText (Tamagui/React Native pattern) instead of onChange; receives text string directly
vlting adds size prop (sm, md, lg) controlling height, padding, border-radius, and label font size
vlting adds leadingSlot and trailingSlot for icons or buttons inside the input row
Built on @tamagui/input; supports focus-visible outline styling
Auto-generates IDs for label-input association and aria-describedby for helper/error text
Also exposes Input.Frame, Input.Label, Input.Helper as lower-level styled components

breaking.vlting: Use Tamagui style props or size/error props

breaking.reason: Cross-platform; receives text string, not event object

breaking.vlting: Use label, error, errorMessage, helperText props

notes: No direct shadcn equivalent; shadcn has no InputGroup component
Groups inputs with addons (text, icons) with connected borders (removes inner border-radius)
InputGroup.Addon renders a styled addon cell (e.g., currency symbol, prefix/suffix text)
InputGroup.Element renders an absolutely-positioned overlay (e.g., search icon inside input)
Size context is shared from root to Addon via React context
Default orientation is 'horizontal'; default size is 'md'
Uses withStaticProperties for compound component pattern

shadcn.import: import { InputOTP, InputOTPGroup, InputOTPSeparator, InputOTPSlot } from '@/components/ui/input-otp'

notes: shadcn wraps input-otp library; vlting is a custom implementation
vlting adds onComplete callback that fires when all digits are entered
Supports controlled and uncontrolled modes (value prop)
Pattern prop accepts a regex string to validate each character (e.g., '[0-9]' for digits only)
Hidden input has inputMode='numeric' and autoComplete='one-time-code' for mobile optimization
Default maxLength is 6
Active slot shows focus ring via boxShadow

breaking.reason: No constant exports; pass regex string

breaking.vlting: Use onComplete for auto-submit when all digits entered

Item.Leading.description: Container for leading content (icon, avatar, etc.)

Item.Content.description: Flex container for title and description

Item.Trailing.description: Container for trailing content (badge, action, etc.)

notes: No shadcn equivalent. Item is a custom @vlting/ui compound component for list items.
Compound component with Root, Leading, Content, Title, Description, and Trailing sub-components.
Uses withStaticProperties for compound API: <Item><Item.Leading /><Item.Content><Item.Title /><Item.Description /></Item.Content><Item.Trailing /></Item>
The 'interactive' variant adds hover/press/focus styles with cursor: pointer.
No shadcn equivalent. Loader is a custom @vlting/ui component wrapping Tamagui's Spinner.
Simple functional component, not compound. Usage: <Loader size='md' variant='primary' />
Maps variant to color tokens: primary=$color10, light=$color4, dark=$color11.
No direct shadcn equivalent. Menu wraps @tamagui/menu and provides a Radix-like compound API.
Includes CheckboxItem, RadioGroup, RadioItem, Sub-menus, and ItemIndicator.
Uses Portal for rendering content outside the DOM tree.
Supports nested sub-menus via Menu.Sub, Menu.SubTrigger, and Menu.SubContent.

shadcn.import: import { Menubar, MenubarMenu, MenubarTrigger, MenubarContent, MenubarItem, MenubarSeparator } from '@/components/ui/menubar'

notes: shadcn Menubar uses Radix UI primitives; @vlting/ui uses a custom context-based implementation with native HTML buttons.
The vlting Menubar.Item has a built-in 'shortcut' prop for displaying keyboard shortcuts, while shadcn requires a separate <MenubarShortcut> component.
vlting Menubar auto-manages open state via context, with hover-switch between menus when any is open.
shadcn has additional sub-components like MenubarCheckboxItem, MenubarRadioGroup, MenubarSub etc. that are not yet implemented in vlting.

breaking.reason: Shortcut is a prop on Item, not a separate component

notes: No shadcn equivalent. NativeSelect renders a native HTML <select> element via styledHtml.
Uses compound API: <NativeSelect.Root><NativeSelect.Option value='a'>A</NativeSelect.Option></NativeSelect.Root>
Unlike Select (which uses Tamagui's custom dropdown), NativeSelect uses the browser's native select picker.
Placeholder is rendered as a disabled <option> at the top of the list.
Custom chevron arrow via CSS background-image SVG.

breaking.reason: Simplified callback with value directly, not event object

shadcn.import: import { NavigationMenu, NavigationMenuList, NavigationMenuItem, NavigationMenuTrigger, NavigationMenuContent, NavigationMenuLink } from '@/components/ui/navigation-menu'

notes: shadcn uses Radix NavigationMenu; vlting uses a custom context-based implementation.
vlting NavigationMenu.Link has an 'active' boolean prop for highlighting the current page.
Full keyboard navigation: ArrowLeft/Right between triggers, ArrowUp/Down within content, Escape to close.
vlting uses dot-notation compound API while shadcn uses separate named imports.
Indicator is a visual-only bar at the bottom, rendered via NavigationMenu.Indicator.

breaking.vlting: NavigationMenu.Link renders an <a> tag directly; use href and onSelect props

shadcn.import: import { Pagination, PaginationContent, PaginationItem, PaginationLink, PaginationPrevious, PaginationNext, PaginationEllipsis } from '@/components/ui/pagination'

notes: vlting Pagination.Root is a fully managed component: pass currentPage, totalPages, and onPageChange, and it auto-renders page buttons with ellipsis.
shadcn Pagination is purely presentational (links with href); vlting is state-driven (onPageChange callback).
vlting supports Button variant customization for nav, page, and active page buttons via navVariant/pageVariant/activePageVariant props.
Built-in page range computation with configurable siblingCount.

breaking.reason: vlting uses callback-based navigation, not href links
vlting Root handles all page number rendering automatically

shadcn.import: import { Popover, PopoverTrigger, PopoverContent } from '@/components/ui/popover'

notes: shadcn uses Radix Popover; vlting wraps @tamagui/popover.
vlting uses 'placement' prop on Root instead of 'side' on Content.
vlting supports 'hoverable' prop for tooltip-like hover behavior.
Content includes built-in Arrow by default (can also use Popover.Arrow separately).
Animations use Tamagui's animation system (medium animation with scale/opacity enter/exit).

breaking.reason: Placement is on Root, not Content

shadcn.import: import { Progress } from '@/components/ui/progress'

notes: Both are simple single-component APIs with value and max props.
vlting adds a 'size' variant (sm/md/lg) that controls track height.
vlting wraps @tamagui/progress with built-in indicator and animation.
shadcn uses Radix Progress; vlting uses Tamagui Progress.
Size maps: sm=$0.5, md=$0.75, lg=$1 height.

shadcn.import: import { RadioGroup, RadioGroupItem } from '@/components/ui/radio-group'

children.description: Label content rendered next to the radio button

notes: Both use compound API with Root + Item pattern.
vlting adds a 'size' prop on Root (sm/md/lg) that propagates to all items via context.
vlting RadioGroup.Item renders a <label> wrapper with the radio indicator and children as label text.
shadcn requires a separate <Label> component next to RadioGroupItem; vlting Item includes the label.
vlting wraps @tamagui/radio-group with built-in indicator styling.

breaking.reason: Label is built into the Item component as children

shadcn.import: import { ResizablePanelGroup, ResizablePanel, ResizableHandle } from '@/components/ui/resizable'

notes: shadcn wraps react-resizable-panels; vlting uses a custom context-based implementation.
API is very similar: PanelGroup, Panel, Handle with the same prop names.
vlting handles panel sizing with percentage-based widths/heights via internal state.
Handle renders a drag grip indicator when withHandle is true (default).
Mouse-based drag resizing with proper cursor styles (col-resize/row-resize).

breaking.reason: No external dependency for resize logic

shadcn.import: import { ScrollArea, ScrollBar } from '@/components/ui/scroll-area'

notes: shadcn uses Radix ScrollArea with custom scrollbar tracks/thumbs; vlting uses CSS-based scrollbar styling.
vlting Scrollbar, Thumb, and Corner are no-op components provided for API shape compatibility only.
Actual scrollbar styling in vlting uses CSS ::-webkit-scrollbar and scrollbar-width/scrollbar-color.
Content should be placed inside ScrollArea.Viewport, not directly in ScrollArea.Root.
Viewport's 'orientation' prop controls overflow direction.

breaking.reason: Content must be inside Viewport sub-component
Uses native scrollbar styling for performance and simplicity

shadcn.import: import { Select, SelectContent, SelectItem, SelectTrigger, SelectValue, SelectGroup, SelectLabel, SelectSeparator } from '@/components/ui/select'

notes: vlting Select is a simplified API: Root component renders the trigger, value display, and content all-in-one.
shadcn requires manually composing SelectTrigger + SelectValue + SelectContent + SelectViewport; vlting handles this automatically.
vlting uses withStaticProperties for compound API: <Select><Select.Item value='a'>A</Select.Item></Select>
vlting wraps @tamagui/select.
Size prop affects trigger height, padding, and font size.

breaking.reason: Simplified API: trigger and content are handled by Root

shadcn.import: import { Sheet, SheetTrigger, SheetContent, SheetHeader, SheetTitle, SheetDescription, SheetFooter, SheetClose } from '@/components/ui/sheet'

notes: shadcn Sheet is a side drawer (top/right/bottom/left); vlting Sheet is a bottom sheet with snap points.
vlting wraps @tamagui/sheet which is mobile-oriented with drag-to-dismiss and snap points.
vlting Sheet always opens from the bottom; for side drawers, use the Drawer component instead.
Includes Handle component for the drag indicator and Overlay for the backdrop.
ScrollView sub-component enables scrollable content within the sheet frame.

breaking.reason: vlting Sheet is always bottom-up; use Drawer for side panels
No built-in header/title sub-components; use Typography or custom layout
vlting supports snap-to-position for mobile-like sheet behavior

notes: No direct shadcn equivalent (shadcn/ui sidebar is an application layout recipe, not a primitive component).
Rich compound API with 13 sub-components for building complete sidebar layouts.
Supports three collapse modes: 'offcanvas' (slides away), 'icon' (collapses to icon width), 'none' (always open).
Three visual variants: 'sidebar' (bordered), 'floating' (elevated with shadow), 'inset'.
GroupLabel auto-hides when collapsed in 'icon' mode.
Uses CSS transitions for smooth open/close animation; respects prefers-reduced-motion.
Trigger component auto-toggles open state and updates aria-expanded.

shadcn.import: import { Slider } from '@/components/ui/slider'

notes: shadcn uses Radix Slider with value as number[]; vlting uses a single number value.
vlting wraps @tamagui/slider; the array-to-single conversion is handled internally.
vlting adds a 'size' prop (sm/md/lg) controlling the slider track and thumb size.
vlting is single-thumb only; shadcn supports multi-thumb range sliders.
Track, TrackActive, and Thumb are rendered automatically; no sub-components needed.

shadcn.import: import { Switch } from '@/components/ui/switch'

notes: Very similar API between shadcn and vlting.
vlting adds a 'size' prop (sm/md/lg) controlling overall dimensions.
vlting wraps @tamagui/switch with built-in thumb.
Both use checked/onCheckedChange pattern.
Size maps to different widths and thumb sizes: sm=$4.5 wide, md=$6 wide, lg=$7 wide.

breaking.vlting: Use name prop or wrap in <label>

shadcn.import: import { Table, TableHeader, TableBody, TableFooter, TableRow, TableHead, TableCell, TableCaption } from '@/components/ui/table'

Table.Root.description: Renders <table> with full HTML table props

Table.Header.description: Renders <thead> with full HTML thead props

Table.Body.description: Renders <tbody> with full HTML tbody props

Table.Footer.description: Renders <tfoot> with full HTML tfoot props

Table.Row.description: Renders <tr> with full HTML tr props

Table.Head.description: Renders <th> with full HTML th props

Table.Cell.description: Renders <td> with full HTML td props

Table.Caption.description: Renders <caption> with full HTML caption props

notes: Both use native HTML table elements (table, thead, tbody, tr, th, td, caption).
vlting Table uses native HTML elements directly (not Tamagui styled views) for proper table layout context.
Styling uses CSS custom properties mapping to Tamagui theme tokens via inline styles.
Both have nearly identical compound APIs with the same sub-component names.
Table.Head defaults scope='col' for accessibility.
All sub-components accept their respective HTML element props and a style override.

breaking.reason: Uses inline styles with Tamagui token CSS variables instead of className

shadcn.import: import { Tabs, TabsList, TabsTrigger, TabsContent } from '@/components/ui/tabs'

notes: Both use compound API with Root/List/Trigger/Content.
vlting wraps @tamagui/tabs with manual activation mode.
vlting adds 'size' prop on Trigger (sm/md/lg) affecting padding and font size.
vlting uses useTabsContext internally to determine active state for styling.
List renders with background color and rounded container for a segmented control appearance.

shadcn.import: import { Textarea } from '@/components/ui/textarea'

notes: vlting Textarea is a higher-level component that includes optional label, helper text, and error state.
shadcn Textarea is a bare styled textarea; vlting wraps @tamagui/input TextArea with a form field layout.
vlting uses onChangeText (string callback) instead of onChange (event callback).
When error is true and errorMessage is provided, it displays instead of helperText.
Auto-generates unique IDs for label-textarea association and aria-describedby linking.

breaking.reason: Direct string callback for cross-platform compatibility
Label is built into the component
vlting includes form field error handling

shadcn.import: import { Toast, ToastAction, ToastClose, ToastDescription, ToastProvider, ToastTitle, ToastViewport } from '@/components/ui/toast'

Toast.ImperativeViewport.description: Renders toasts created by the imperative toast() API

opts.action.shape: { label: string, altText: string, onClick: () => void }

toast.dismiss(id).description: Dismisses a specific toast by ID

notes: vlting Toast has BOTH declarative and imperative APIs.
Declarative: <Toast.Root variant='success'><Toast.Title>...</Toast.Title></Toast.Root>
Imperative: toast('Hello'), toast.success('Done'), toast.error('Failed'), toast.warning('Watch out')
toast.promise() handles loading/success/error states automatically for async operations.
vlting has 4 variants (default, success, error, warning); shadcn has 2 (default, destructive).
Imperative toasts require <Toast.ImperativeViewport /> to be mounted in the component tree.
Uses useSyncExternalStore for the imperative toast store (works outside React components).
Also exports useToastController and useToastState hooks from @tamagui/toast.

breaking.reason: Different variant naming and more options
Imperative API is a standalone function, not a hook

shadcn.import: import { Toggle } from '@/components/ui/toggle'

notes: Very similar API between shadcn and vlting for standalone Toggle.
vlting also exports ToggleGroup (from @tamagui/toggle-group) with single/multiple selection modes.
vlting standalone Toggle uses styledHtml('button') for native <button> rendering.
Toggle sizes: shadcn uses 'default'/'sm'/'lg'; vlting uses 'sm'/'md'/'lg'.
ToggleGroup uses withStaticProperties for ToggleGroup.Item compound API.
ToggleGroup supports roving focus keyboard navigation via Tamagui.

shadcn.import: import { Tooltip, TooltipTrigger, TooltipContent, TooltipProvider } from '@/components/ui/tooltip'

notes: vlting Tooltip is a simplified single-component API: <Tooltip content='text'><Button /></Tooltip>
shadcn requires composing Tooltip + TooltipTrigger + TooltipContent manually.
vlting uses 'content' prop for tooltip text; no need for a separate Content sub-component.
vlting uses 'delay' prop; shadcn uses 'delayDuration'.
vlting wraps @tamagui/tooltip with built-in arrow and animations.
TooltipProvider wraps @tamagui/tooltip's TooltipGroup for shared delay behavior.

breaking.reason: Simplified single-component API with content prop
All config on the single Tooltip component

shadcn.import: No single import; shadcn uses Tailwind utility classes on native HTML elements

props.description:
shadcn typography is applied via className utilities, not components. Example:

Title

vlting.import: import { H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6, P, Lead, Large, Small, Muted, Blockquote, InlineCode, List, ListItem } from '@vlting/ui'

Blockquote.description: Renders <blockquote>, fontFamily=$quote, italic, with left border

notes: shadcn uses Tailwind CSS classes on raw HTML elements; vlting provides pre-styled components.
All vlting Typography components use styledHtml() which renders actual semantic HTML elements.
Heading weight alternation pattern: h1(heavy/$6) -> h2(light/$5) -> h3(heavy/$4) -> h4(light/$3) -> h5(heavy/$2) -> h6(light/$1).
All components accept standard HTML element props and Tamagui style props.
Components are individually exported (not a compound component).
Uses Tamagui font tokens ($heading, $body, $mono, $quote) for consistent typography across brands.

breaking.reason: Pre-styled components instead of utility classes
Semantic component instead of utility classes
Token-based styling for cross-platform and theming support
